channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1135; 06:28PM; 14735 W Bessemer St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ILGALy; #VanNuys; Firefighters arrived to find a one-story commercial building containing an upholstery shop and auto body shop with heavy fire inside. Firefighters mounted a coordinated attack on the fire on the ~8,500 sq-ft building. Firefighters overcame forcible entry challenges, both on the exterior and encountering additional security measures inside, to gain access for hose lines to advance, as other crews ascended ladders to the roof to provide vertical ventilation. Ultimately, it took 40 firefighters 23 minutes to extinguish the flames, which were initially spotted and reported by an LAPD helicopter. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC14 CM40 CM42 E102 E239 E288 E289 E39 E88 E89 JT3 RA839 RA88 T39 T88 T89 UR88; CH8; 17 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1135; 06:05PM; 14700 W Bessemer St; MAP: https://bit.ly/43Pz4rh; #VanNuys; One-story commercial building with heavy smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E288 E39 E88 RA839 RA88 T88; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#0564; 11:12AM; 3024 N Runyon Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ouyD6F; #HollywoodHillsWest; Firefighters located a 39-year-old hiker and his dog, who were stranded part way up a steep ravine in the Runyon Canyon area. LAFD set up a 600-foot two-line rope system and performed a low-angle rope rescue to help the man and his "best friend" down to safer ground. Firefighter-Paramedics performed a medical assessment and found no injury or illness, therefore, no hospital transport was needed. Nothing further.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E261 E27 E41 E82 E90 H5 H7 HA5 HA7 RA27 RA41 RA76 RA827 RH114 T27 T61 UR27; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#1220; 06:19PM; 1488 Bienveneda Ave; MAP: https://bit.ly/3oAx338; #PacificPalisades; Firefighters located a 53-year-old female hiker in a remote area of Temescal Canyon with a lower extremity injury. LAFD Air Ops hoisted her and brought her to a nearby helispot, where she received a medical assessment by LAFD Firefighter-Paramedics and then assisted with getting back to her vehicle. She declined transport to the hospital. Nothing further.; FS 69; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 E269 E443 H5 H7 HA5 HA7 RA23 RH114 T69; CH7; 14; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#1135; 04:47PM; Simi Hills; MAP: https://bit.ly/43s6MTb; #Chatsworth; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to a stranded but uninjured teenage male hiker, who climbed a large boulder in a remote section of Chatsworth Park South, and is unable to descend safely. An LAFD rescue helicopter was able to find the teen, and lowered a rescuer. The pair will soon be hoisted into the hovering LAFD helicopter, and flown to the safety of a nearby helispot.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E106 E296 H3 H5 HA3 HA5 RA96 RH114 T96; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision; INC#0553; 10:29AM; 301 E 41st Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/45BeLPZ; #HistoricSouthCentral; Solo vehicle sheared hydrant before striking/damaging a small commercial building. One civilian injury (unknown if from vehicle or premises) later taken to an area hospital with non-life threatening injury. With the concurrence of the Department of Building & Safety on scene, LAFD will physically stabilize the damaged building and assist in the removal of the vehicle. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD Central Traffic Division (Incident #1701).; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; E221 E227 RA46 RA827 T21 T27 UR27 UR88; CH7; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1498; 09:28PM; 1426 S Armacost Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qcivqQ; #Sawtelle; *Address Confirmed* The first arriving 18 LAFD Firefighters took just 13 minutes in a well-coordinated offensive fire attack, to confine and extinguish flames in one second floor unit at the rear of a two-story apartment building. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 59; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 E237 E37 E59 RA59 T37; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1498; 09:15PM; 1426 S Armacost Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qcivqQ; #Sawtelle; *Address Tentative*. Offensive fire attack on one second floor unit well involved at the rear of a two-story apartment building.; FS 59; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 E237 E37 E59 RA59 T37; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Greater Alarm Fire; INC#0678; 12:50PM; 1709 E 24th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MzCqaK; #CentralAlameda; 48 LAFD Firefighters + responders from nearby LACoFD stations in Automatic Aid, took just 45 minutes in largely defensive firefighting operations, to access, confine and extinguish a 75' x 100' pile of metal debris and machinery ablaze at a metal recycling business in an industrial area. No evacuation. No injury. Firefighters will remain on scene this afternoon to overhaul the fire and complete extinguishment of smoldering debris. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 BC18 CM20 CM22 E10 E14 E17 E21 E210 E211 EM1 RA14 RA814 T10 T11 T9 + LACoFD AC6 BC13 E13 E164 E52 T164; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

Greater Alarm Fire; INC#0678; 12:05PM; 1709 E 24th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MzCqaK; #CentralAlameda; PRELIM: Defensive firefighting operations on a 75' x 100' pile of metal recycling material and machinery in an industrial area. No structure threat. No evacuation. No injury. ; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 BC18 CM20 CM22 E10 E14 E17 E21 E210 E211 EM1 RA14 RA814 T10 T11 T9 + LACoFD in Automatic Aid.; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey
